greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into prime power parts (1 excluded).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
program: lista(m) = {x = t + t*O(t^m); gf = prod(k=1, m, if (isprimepower(k), 1/(1-x^k), 1)); for (n=0, m, print1(polcoeff(gf, n, t), ", "));}
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_
